quotes.quote: Death is more universal than life; everyone dies but not everyone lives.
quotes.author: A. Sachs

quotes.quote: When I pass, speak freely of my shortcomings and my flaws. Learn from them, for I'll have no ego to injure.
quotes.author: Aaron McGruder

quotes.quote: Death is better, a milder fate than tyranny.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: There is some comfort in dying surrounded by one's children.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: We do not die because we have to die; we die because one day, and not so long ago, our consciousness was forced to deem it necessary.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: Do not fear death so much, but rather the inadequate life.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote:
For certain is death for the born
And certain is birth for the dead;
Therefore over the inevitable
Thou shouldst not grieve.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I'd rather get my brains blown out in the wild than wait in terror at the slaughterhouse.
quotes.author: Craig Volk

quotes.quote: The killing was the best part. It was the dying I couldn't take.
quotes.author: Craig Volk

quotes.quote: Be open to your dreams, people. Embrace that distant shore. Because our mortal journey is over all too soon.
quotes.author: David Assael

quotes.quote: A man should not leave this earth with unfinished business. He should live each day as if it was a pre-flight check. He should ask each morning, am I prepared to lift-off?
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: Death is the enemy. I spent 10 years of my life singlemindedly studying, practicing, fighting hand to hand in close quarters to defeat the enemy, to send him back bloodied and humble and I am not going to roll over and surrender.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: I am going to concentrate on what's important in life. I'm going to strive everyday to be a kind and generous and loving person. I'm going to keep death right here, so that anytime I even think about getting angry at you or anybody else, I'll see death and I'll remember.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: It's no accident that the church and the graveyard stand side by side. The city of the dead sleeps encircled by the city of the living.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: I'm afraid I'm being an awful nuisance.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Death is nothing to us, since when we are, death has not come, and when death has come, we are not.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: I hope the leaving is joyful; and I hope never to return.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: There's a strange sort of quiet when you're dying. It's as if you're in a glass room, and the walls keep getting thicker and thicker.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: There is no cure for birth and death save to enjoy the interval.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Pale Death with impartial tread beats at the poor man's cottage door and at the palaces of kings.
quotes.author: Hugh Elliott

quotes.quote: Death can sneak up on you like a silent kitten, surprising you with it's touch and you have a right to act surprised. Other times death stomps in the front door, unwanted and unannounced, and makes it's noisy way to your seat on the sofa.
quotes.author: Hugh Elliott

quotes.quote: I am not dying, not anymore than any of us are at any moment. We run, hopefully as fast as we can, and then everyone must stop. We can only choose how we handle the race.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: John Scalzi

quotes.quote: When you lose someone you love, you die too, and you wait around for your body to catch up.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: For three days after death hair and fingernails continue to grow but phone calls taper off.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: It is impossible that anything so natural, so necessary, and so universal as death, should ever have been designed by Providence as an evil to mankind.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.
